name: Hansel and Gretel DS
storyline:
Another entry in the “Dark Side” fairy tale series (after The Dark Side of Red Riding Hood). Help Hansel and Gretel, abandoned by their parents in the middle of the forest, escape and return home safely.

This is a point and click adventure game, a departure from Charon’s usual works, but still fun nevertheless.
summary:
Your destiny will change depending on the path you choose.
Is it a beast that attacks the two? A witch? Or...
Please guide them to the ultimate "hunt" ending.
